meaning: can't out-argue someone, can't win an argument against

examples.chinese: 在某些情況你說不過對方，只好不甘心地認同對方的觀點
examples.translation: In some situations you can't out-argue the other person, so you reluctantly accept their viewpoint.

examples.chinese: 跟律師說不過，還是算了。
examples.translation: Can't win an argument against a lawyer, better just give up.

sourceEnglish: talk 人　down, arugue 人 down
